faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Netflix. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.

questions.question: How do I sign up for Netflix?
questions.answer: To sign up for Netflix, visit our website and click on the 'Sign Up' button. Choose your plan, enter your email and create a password. You can start watching immediately after signing up.

questions.question: What plans does Netflix offer?
questions.answer: Netflix offers three plans: Basic ($8.99/month), Standard ($13.49/month), and Premium ($17.99/month). Each plan allows streaming on different numbers of devices simultaneously.

questions.question: How do I cancel my Netflix subscription?
questions.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Go to your Account page, click on 'Cancel Membership' under Membership & Billing, and follow the instructions.

questions.question: When will I be charged for my Netflix subscription?
questions.answer: You'll be charged at the beginning of your billing cycle. For new members, this is the date you signed up. You can check your next billing date in your Account settings.

questions.question: How do I update my payment method?
questions.answer: Go to your Account page and click on 'Update payment info' under Membership & Billing. You can add a new payment method or update your existing one.

questions.question: Can I get a refund?
questions.answer: Refunds are not available for Netflix subscriptions. However, you can cancel your membership at any time to stop future charges.

questions.question: How many devices can I watch Netflix on at once?
questions.answer: This depends on your plan: Basic (1 device), Standard (2 devices), Premium (4 devices). You can watch on any supported device with internet.

questions.question: Why is Netflix not working on my device?
questions.answer: Try restarting your device, checking your internet connection, or updating the Netflix app. If issues persist, visit our Help Center for device-specific troubleshooting.

questions.question: Can I download content to watch offline?
questions.answer: Yes, you can download select TV shows and movies to watch offline on supported devices. Look for the download icon next to the title.

questions.question: How do I create profiles for different family members?
questions.answer: Go to your Account page and click on 'Manage Profiles' under Profile & Parental Controls. You can create up to 5 profiles per account.

questions.question: How do I change my email address?
questions.answer: Visit your Account page and click on 'Change email' under Membership & Billing. You'll need to verify your new email address.

questions.question: Can I share my Netflix account with others?
questions.answer: Netflix accounts are for personal use only. Sharing account details violates our Terms of Use. Each household should have their own account.

questions.question: How does Netflix recommend content?
questions.answer: Our recommendation system uses your viewing history, ratings, and preferences to suggest content you'll enjoy. The more you watch, the better our recommendations become.

questions.question: Why can't I find a specific movie or show?
questions.answer: Content availability varies by region due to licensing agreements. Some titles may not be available in your country, or they may have been removed from our catalog.

questions.question: How do I rate content on Netflix?
questions.answer: You can rate titles by hovering over them and clicking the thumbs up or thumbs down icon. This helps us improve our recommendations for you.

faq.title: Questions fréquentes
faq.subtitle: Trouvez des réponses aux questions courantes sur Netflix. Vous ne trouvez pas ce que vous cherchez ? Contactez notre équipe d'assistance.

questions.a: Pour vous inscrire à Netflix, visitez notre site Web et cliquez sur le bouton 'S'inscrire'. Choisissez votre forfait, entrez votre e-mail et créez un mot de passe. Vous pouvez commencer à regarder immédiatement après vous être inscrit.
Netflix propose trois forfaits : Basique (8,99 $/mois), Standard (13,49 $/mois) et Premium (17,99 $/mois). Chaque forfait permet de diffuser sur un nombre différent d'appareils simultanément.
Vous pouvez annuler votre abonnement à tout moment. Allez sur votre page Compte, cliquez sur 'Annuler l'abonnement' dans la section Abonnement et facturation, et suivez les instructions.

questions.q: Quand vais-je être facturé pour mon abonnement Netflix ?
questions.a: Vous serez facturé au début de votre cycle de facturation. Pour les nouveaux membres, c'est la date à laquelle vous vous êtes inscrit. Vous pouvez vérifier votre prochaine date de facturation dans les paramètres de votre compte.

questions.q: Comment puis-je mettre à jour mon mode de paiement ?
questions.a: Allez sur votre page Compte et cliquez sur 'Mettre à jour les informations de paiement' dans la section Abonnement et facturation. Vous pouvez ajouter un nouveau mode de paiement ou mettre à jour votre mode de paiement existant.
Les remboursements ne sont pas disponibles pour les abonnements Netflix. Cependant, vous pouvez annuler votre abonnement à tout moment pour arrêter les frais futurs.

questions.q: Combien d'appareils puis-je regarder Netflix en même temps ?
questions.a: Cela dépend de votre forfait : Basique (1 appareil), Standard (2 appareils), Premium (4 appareils). Vous pouvez regarder sur tout appareil compatible avec Internet.

questions.q: Pourquoi Netflix ne fonctionne-t-il pas sur mon appareil ?
questions.a: Essayez de redémarrer votre appareil, de vérifier votre connexion Internet ou de mettre à jour l'application Netflix. Si les problèmes persistent, visitez notre Centre d'aide pour des solutions spécifiques à votre appareil.

questions.q: Puis-je télécharger du contenu pour le regarder hors ligne ?
questions.a: Oui, vous pouvez télécharger certaines émissions et films pour les regarder hors ligne sur des appareils compatibles. Recherchez l'icône de téléchargement à côté du titre.

questions.q: Comment créer des profils pour les différents membres de la famille ?
questions.a: Allez sur votre page Compte et cliquez sur 'Gérer les profils' dans la section Profil et contrôles parentaux. Vous pouvez créer jusqu'à 5 profils par compte.

questions.q: Comment puis-je changer mon adresse e-mail ?
questions.a: Visitez votre page Compte et cliquez sur 'Changer d'e-mail' dans la section Abonnement et facturation. Vous devrez vérifier votre nouvelle adresse e-mail.

questions.q: Puis-je partager mon compte Netflix avec d'autres personnes ?
questions.a: Les comptes Netflix sont réservés à un usage personnel. Le partage des détails du compte viole nos Conditions d'utilisation. Chaque foyer doit avoir son propre compte.

Notre système de recommandation utilise votre historique de visionnage, vos évaluations et vos préférences pour suggérer du contenu que vous pourriez aimer. Plus vous regardez, meilleures sont nos recommandations.

questions.q: Pourquoi ne puis-je pas trouver un film ou une émission spécifique ?
questions.a: La disponibilité du contenu varie selon les régions en raison des accords de licence. Certains titres peuvent ne pas être disponibles dans votre pays, ou ils peuvent avoir été retirés de notre catalogue.

questions.q: Comment évaluer du contenu sur Netflix ?
questions.a: Vous pouvez évaluer les titres en les survolant et en cliquant sur l'icône du pouce vers le haut ou vers le bas. Cela nous aide à améliorer nos recommandations pour vous.

questions.question: Can I watch Netflix on multiple devices?
questions.answer: Yes! Depending on your plan, you can watch on 1-4 devices simultaneously. You can also download content for offline viewing on up to 100 devices.

questions.question: Do I need a smart TV to watch Netflix?
questions.answer: No, you don't need a smart TV. You can watch on any device with the Netflix app or through a web browser, including gaming consoles, streaming devices, and computers.

questions.question: What's the difference between HD and Ultra HD?
questions.answer: HD (High Definition) offers 1080p resolution, while Ultra HD (4K) provides 2160p resolution for sharper, more detailed picture quality. Ultra HD requires compatible devices and a Premium plan.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Netflix, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our streaming service. By using Netflix, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

sections.title: Information We Collect
content: Account Information: Email address, password, and profile information you provide when creating an account.
Usage Data: Information about how you use Netflix, including viewing history, search queries, and device information.
Payment Information: Billing details and payment method information (processed securely by third-party providers).
Device Information: IP address, browser type, operating system, and device identifiers.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
content: Provide and improve our streaming service
Personalize your viewing experience and recommendations
Process payments and manage your account
Communicate with you about your account and our services
Ensure security and prevent fraud
Comply with legal obligations

sections.title: Information Sharing
content: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
We may share information with service providers who help us operate Netflix.
We may disclose information when required by law or to protect our rights.
Aggregated, anonymized data may be shared for research or business purposes.

sections.title: Data Security
content: We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data.
We regularly update our security measures to protect against unauthorized access.
We limit access to personal information to authorized employees only.
We conduct regular security audits and assessments.

sections.title: Your Rights
content: Access: You can request a copy of the personal information we have about you.
Correction: You can update your account information at any time.
Deletion: You can request deletion of your account and associated data.
Portability: You can request your data in a portable format.
Opt-out: You can opt out of certain data processing activities.

sections.title: Cookies and Tracking
content: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience and provide personalized content.
You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.
We may use analytics tools to understand how our service is used.
We do not respond to 'Do Not Track' signals at this time.

sections.title: Children's Privacy
content: Netflix is not intended for children under 13.
We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
If we become aware of such collection, we will delete the information immediately.
Parental controls are available to help manage children's viewing.

sections.title: International Data Transfers
content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own.
We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for international transfers.
Our service is available in many countries worldwide.
Data protection laws may vary by jurisdiction.

sections.title: Changes to This Policy
content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
We will notify you of material changes via email or service notifications.
Your continued use of Netflix after changes constitutes acceptance.
The effective date of changes will be posted at the top of this policy.
